ComicInfo.Summary:
In the deep, dark woods, Rachel finally learns her saviours’ terrible secret, and struggles to come to terms with the sins of her nation. But as the Soviet advance gets nearer and nearer, she may just take the truth she’s longed for to her grave- in the third and final episode of The Last German Winter. Part three of “The Last German Winter,” by Garth Ennis and Tomas Aira. Available with Regular &Wraparound Covers by Tomas Aria, and Good Girl Nose Art & Battle Damage Retailer Incentive Covers by Matt Martin.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Tomas Aira | 1 | Wrap | Wraparound Cover | Tomas Aira | 2 | GGNA | Good Girl Nose Art Cover | Matt Martin | 3 | RI | 1:3 Battle Damage Retailer Incentive Cover | Matt Martin | 4 |

ComicInfo.Title: The Last German Winter, Part 3: The Earth Will Shake As We Leave the Scene
